attributes.action: Demonstrate public support for the use of stem cells in medical research
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stem cells (either embryonic or adult) will play a vital role in medical research in the next decade. The public image of stem cell research is currently very poor largely due to lack of information. I urge the government to display public support for stem cell research and support scientists working in this field. I would ask researchers in this area to engage the public in discussion to try and dispel the myths and untruths that have grown up around this area of research.
